question.body: Which direction is the arrow pointing?

response.feedback: Incorrect. This answer is close in orientation, but the opposite direction.
Correct. The arrow points to the posterior (back) of the body.
Incorrect. In directional terminology, an arrow pointing in a superior direction would be pointing up.
